summary: This mod is a relatively simple addition to your game. It alters the Dawnstar Dark Brotherhood Sanctuary in balanced and relatively subtle ways.
descriptionHtml:
This mod is a relatively simple addition to your game. It alters the Dark Brotherhood Dawnstar Sanctuary in balanced and relatively subtle ways. 

The following has been done to the sanctuary:
- Allows access to the crypt area after full sanctuary acquisition
- Adds a forge, grinding wheel and armor bench after full sanctuary acquisition
- Adds a enchanter\'s bench to the alchemy upgrade (installed with the alchemy upgrade)
- Adds 2 extra mannequins to the main bedroom
- Completes the DB armor set on the primary mannequin
- Adds an extra book shelf to the main bedroom
- Adds a safe to the main bedroom (can be used for long term storage)
- Added some extra lighting
- Exchanged the main bed for an upgraded version

This should not break any quests or cause any issues. 
Possible conflicts may arise with other mods that affect the Dawnstar Dark Brotherhood Sanctuary.
author: ArchDuke

files.name: Dawnstar Sanctuary Improvements
files.changelogHtml: Found and corrected the incorrect scripts that prevented the clothes being on the mannequins at intial loading
